text: All over the world, data storage is growing exponentially.

But some data is accessed constantly; 
some is only needed monthly or yearly

but most of the time, predicting your 
access needs is virtually impossible.
That’s why we’ve developed Amazon S3 Intelligent-Tiering:

the first and only cloud storage that delivers cost 
savings by monitoring your data access patterns
and automatically placing data into the most cost-efficient tier with no operational overhead, or impact on performance.

If an object becomes infrequently or
rarely accessed, S3 Intelligent-Tiering
will automatically move it to a lower-cost access tier.

If that object’s requested again, it's available in
milliseconds and is moved back
to the Frequent Access Tier at no additional charge.
S3 Intelligent-Tiering’s flexibility and automatic cost savings...

...make it ideal for data with unknown,
unpredictable access patterns…
...like data lakes, analytics, machine learning, or new applications.

Maximize the value of your company’s data while 
minimizing the time and money spent managing it
